GenAiFunction.description: This Agentforce action gets booking availability time slots for the current product which can be used to book the user in to events for a given product. If the user has chosen a bookableLocationId, availableBookingSlots will only be returned for that location. Alternatively, the agent can enter sanitised country and state to return availableBookingSlots for all locations within those locations. The product should always be confirmed purchasable in the current storeId before using this action.
GenAiFunction.masterLabel: [OLD] AF - UAIS006 - Get Booking Product Time Slots
